title: BRIEF-Traffic Technologies Awarded Further Contract To Supply "Smart City" Led Streetlights
text:
BRIEF-Traffic Technologies Awarded Further Contract To Supply "Smart City" Led Streetlights

Stock Markets 31 minutes ago (Oct 07, 2019 11:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Traffic Technologies Awarded Further Contract To Supply "Smart City" Led Streetlights Oct 7 (Reuters) - Traffic Technologies Ltd : * AWARDED A FURTHER CONTRACT TO SUPPLY "SMART CITY" LED STREETLIGHTS TO DM ROADS IN NEW SOUTH WALES * NEW CONTRACT VALUED AT $1 MILLION

BRIEF-Traffic Technologies Awarded Further Contract To Supply "Smart City" Led Streetlights
